release.action: Link to picture of J.J. Rousseau, from Wikipedia failed. Now we have the picture in the project. The painting and the photo of the painting is in the public domain.

release.description: RousseauBean is changed into an interface
release.action: RousseauBean is changed into an interface. An abstract subclass AbstractRousseauBean containing a partial implementation of the interface is introduced.

release.description: Fix for NullPointerException in debug code
release.action: Fix for NullPointerException in debug code.

CompoundPropertyException close() now throws IllegalStateException when called when already closed (can't close twice). This was introduced to better trace a weird error that occurred in OLTS. This is considered a bug fix in the contract (which is possible because IllegalStateException is a RuntimeException). For OLTS, this change has to appear also in a branch.

Added Beans.getNavigatedPropertyValue: The value of the property propertyExpression of object bean. propertyExpression can be an expression to navigate through an object graph, of the form property1.property2.property3.

An extra constructor for PropertyExceptions, that take a boolean argument that says whether the exception occurs during initialization of the origin or not. If so, we should not carry a reference to the incomplete origin.

PropertyExceptions no longer have a mandatory origin. This is needed to be able to throw PropertyExceptions during bean initialization. This change is incompatible, because an existing type invariant is removed. The BeanInstantiationException is not really deprecated, but maybe it should be.
Moved bean_II.persistent to separate lib ppw-persistence.

release.description: Move of contract functions to Toryt, add AsynchronousCrudFactory
release.action: Deprecated be.peopleware.bean_II.Associations. This functionality is now in Toryt.
Added method reportsOn to PropertyException and CompoundPropertyException.
Worked around the hibernate caching issue. Check if returned type does match the requested type. If not a IdNotFoundException is generated.
